      • getGLJournalEntries

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.accounting.shared.model.GLJournalEntry> getGLJournalEntries(java.lang.String branchID,
                                                                                            java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                                                            java.util.Date toDate,
                                                                                            java.lang.Integer offset,
                                                                                            java.lang.Integer limit)
                                                                                     throws MambuApiException
        Returns all GLJournalEntries of a specific date-range
        Parameters:
        branchID - branch Id
        fromDate - range starting from. Must not be null
        toDate - range ending at. Must not be null
        offset - offset to start pagination. If null, the default value of 0 (zero) will be used.
        limit - page-size. If null, the default value of 50 (fifty) will be used.
        Returns:
        a List of GLJournalEntries
        Throws:
        MambuApiException - in case of an error

      • getGLJournalEntries

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.accounting.shared.model.GLJournalEntry> getGLJournalEntries(com.mambu.api.server.handler.core.dynamicsearch.model.JSONFilterConstraints filterConstraints,
                                                                                            java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                            java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                     throws MambuApiException
        Get GL journal entries by specifying filter constraints
        Parameters:
        filterConstraints - filter constraints. Must not be null
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        list of GL journal entries matching filter constraints
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • postGLJournalEntries

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.accounting.shared.model.GLJournalEntry> postGLJournalEntries(java.util.List<ApiGLJournalEntry> entries,
                                                                                             java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                             java.lang.String date,
                                                                                             java.lang.String notes)
                                                                                      throws MambuApiException
        Post GL Journal Entries
        Parameters:
        entries - a list of entries with the GL transaction details. Must not be null. At least one debit and one credit entry must be specified. Any number of journal entries may be posted with a given date and branch id as long as the standard accounting rules apply. For each entry its glCode, entryType and amount must not be null.
        branchId - a branch id.
        date - The date of the posting of the journal entry. Must be not null
        notes - transaction notes
        Returns:
        created journal entries
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • postGLJournalEntries

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.accounting.shared.model.GLJournalEntry> postGLJournalEntries(java.util.List<ApiGLJournalEntry> entries,
                                                                                             java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                             java.lang.String date,
                                                                                             java.lang.String notes,
                                                                                             java.lang.String transactionId)
                                                                                      throws MambuApiException
        Post GL Journal Entries
        Parameters:
        entries - a list of entries with the GL transaction details. Must not be null. At least one debit and one credit entry must be specified. Any number of journal entries may be posted with a given date and branch id as long as the standard accounting rules apply. For each entry its glCode, entryType and amount must not be null.
        branchId - a branch id.
        date - The date of the posting of the journal entry. Must be not null
        notes - transaction notes
        transactionId - the transaction id
        Returns:
        created journal entries
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
